channel.title: Sigsiu.NET News
channel.description: Latest News of Sigsiu.NET, the company behind SobiPro - best directory component for Joomla! powered websites!

item.title: Entries Module updated
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: An update of the Entries Module is available. This is a maintenance release.

item.title: A Cars and Vehicles Marketplace with SobiPro
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: The Cars and Vehicles Marketplace template for SobiPro is back! Offer cars with SobiPro now.

item.title: Update of Aggregation Field
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: An update of the Aggregation Field is available with some great new features added, like the tags management.

item.title: SobiPro goes e-commerce
item.author: Radek Suski
item.description: Finally you can use SobiPro now also as a shop due to the integration of SobiPro with the J2Store shopping cart extension!

item.title: JaB15 - Recap
item.author: Radek Suski
item.description: At the end of May this year something really scary happened. A bunch of people from the famous Joomla! gang took over a hotel in a wonderful city called Prague.

item.title: Sobi is 9 years old - and you will get gifts
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: Exactly 9 years ago we released the very first version of Sobi followed later by Sobi2 and SobiPro. We are so happy to have such a great community and we would love to say "thank you"!

item.title: Update of Expiration App available
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: An update of the Expiration Application is available now. This is a maintenance release. Update is recommended.

item.title: Version 3.2 of SP-GeoMap Field released
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: This is a maintenance release of the SP-GeoMap Field with Proximity Search. Google 'Autocomplete' as search provider is added now, as well as two new languages.

item.title: Update of SP-GeoMap Module
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: An update of the SP-GeoMap Module is available. This is a maintenance release which includes two new languages.

item.title: New application Expiration
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: It is finally available: The Expiration application for SobiPro to let you manage the expiration notification and renew emails and the renew process.
